title: 81/581/EEC: Commission Decision of 6 July 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Kay sona- graph, models 6061 B, 7029 A and 7030 A' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 July 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as "KAY sona-graph, models 6061 B, 7029 A and 7030 A" may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (81/581/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Kay sona-graph, models 6061 B, 7029 A and 7030 A" which is the subject of an application by the United Kingdom of 13 January 1981 may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 July 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
